MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 Postcode area of Sandbach We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.23AM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.02AM 27th January 2021.
